Uses of ScenarioDefiner in org.jbehave.scenario
 

Methods in org.jbehave.scenario that return ScenarioDefiner
 ScenarioDefiner PropertyBasedConfiguration.forDefiningScenarios()
          Returns the default ScenarioDefiner.
 ScenarioDefiner MostUsefulConfiguration.forDefiningScenarios()
          Defines scenarios by looking for a file named after the scenario and in the same package, using lower-case underscored name in place of the camel-cased name - so MyScenario.java maps to my_scenario.
 ScenarioDefiner Configuration.forDefiningScenarios()
           
 

Uses of ScenarioDefiner in org.jbehave.scenario.parser
 

Classes in org.jbehave.scenario.parser that implement ScenarioDefiner
 class ClasspathScenarioDefiner
          Loads scenario definition from classpath resources, which are handled by the ScenarioParser.
